title: I just got bugsplat. will i get banned for disconnected to the game?

replies.body:
Hey Nick,

The match will count against you if you were not able to get back into the game.  If you're experiencing bugsplats often, you can check out our [Bugsplat knowlegde base](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to help prevent this issue from messing up any of your games.
